content:
I'll fill in the brand and size for my loafers. **Shoe 4** should read:

* Type: Loafers
* Brand: [Let's say] Allen Edmonds
* Style: Brown loafers
* Color: Brown
* Size: 9
* Condition: Good
* Notable features: Polished on Jan 20th
* Last Maintenance: Jan 20th

I think I'll update the "Last Maintenance" column whenever I do something significant to my shoes, like polishing, conditioning, or repairing them. That way, I can keep track of when I last took care of my shoes and plan ahead for future maintenance.

By the way, I remember buying those black leather boots on December 15th. I got a discount of $20 on the original price of $150 because I had a loyalty coupon.
